post.body: Of course... keep me posted

was discussing Pulicat with @Ravages but @PlaneMad 's Tiruneermalai suggestion is also good. Have to get away from urban centres.
if you mean planespotting, all you need is a pair of binocuars. If you mean anything else, you will also need a good lawyer.
Yeah, a pity. Probably would have been the best place to go to in the city, with a telescope.
Probably not a great place. Too much city light + airport = FAIL
afraid some of my puzzle pieces might have been swept away with the litter... egad!
